title: Did Dad's message prove that anyone making COVED-19 masks could hit him?
subtitle: A letter falsely attributed to the Ohio State Bar Association made some questionable allegations.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In July 2020, it was reported that a letter from the Ohio State Bar Association was accurate, stating that any retailer or manufacturer - including those working from home - could be sued for selling or creating COVD-19 facial masks without medical approval, defect or without proper marking.
